item.description:
This day was alot of fun last year and we are going to use the same venue this year.

Magazine Beach is a park along the Charles with room to kick a footy or play some backyard cricket. It is about a 15 minute walk from Central T or if you prefer you could use the B line and walk across the bridge, about a 10 minute walk. There is also parking if people would prefer to drive.

There is a Trader Joes across the road from the park which make it easy to get your picnic lunch on the day. Has anyone go a portable bbq we could use? If no one does then we will just have a picnic instead.

I will try and get a cricket set online unless someone already has one they could bring along. Has anyone got a footy? If you have equipment you can bring please write it in the rsvp comments.

Cheers,

Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Australia Day in July
